channel.title: Mage\Bow/Help
channel.description: [center][font=Verdana]I need help geting mage bow spec working, every spec on my server works besides mage bow. Another task I need help with is making mage have to have a certain bonus from your gear to actually hit; like +15 mage attack bonus to be able to mage, something like that.[/font][/center]
